casebody.data:
2001-2968 (La. 10/14/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Jerry WALKER, Jr. No. 2001-KO-2968. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Walker, Jerry Jr.;—Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Caddo, 1st Judicial District Court Div. C, No. 186,558; to the Court of Appeal, Second Circuit, No. 35,114-KA.

Denied.
